website_summaries.verdict: No frills way to relieve foot, leg and knee pain.
pros: Small beads to massage feet and prevent feet from sliding
Many owners rave that they flip it around to maintain comfort depending on where they are sitting
cons: Like all footrests, it was too high for some, too short for others

customer_reviews.title: Using in Conjunction with Something Else
customer_reviews.text: I have edema in my ankles. I got this to use at work to try to see if elevation would help with that. Used as is, it didn't help. It isn't high enough to help with my issues. It was very well made and felt good on the feet. I decided to put it on top of something else, so my legs would be high enough, but comfortable. I'm using a laundry basket actually. The cushion fits perfectly across the top of the basket and is at just the right level. Works wonderfully. It's not quite how it was intended to be used, but it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: E Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Loved It ---- BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I loved the feel of this foot rest. It was pretty much perfect except for one thing. It's too high. I use a drop down keyboard tray, so in order to use the footrest I had to raise my keyboard tray, which made it difficult to type. So I had to return it, which was disappointing as this item has so much going for it. The interchangeable rocking feature with non-moving status, the small beaded covering that is a great foot massage. It was just too high for my use. :( If you're keyboard tray is at desk level, then I believe this product will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: 95% Romance Reader

customer_reviews.title: Solid Footrest
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I like the little bumpy beads on my bare feet as well. It definitely is a nice feeling. The only thing I'm sad about is it lost some of it's firmness in just the first few days. Now it's a lot more squishy and less satisfying to put my feet on. I wish it was still firm.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great foot rest.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect height for a foot rest. I've been looking for something to relieve my lower back pressure while sitting at a desk all day, this definitely fits the bill. (And my IT guys MUCH prefer me not putting my feel up on my computer!) Soft but firm, it's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Perfect firmness.
customer_reviews.text: This foot rest is very comfortable. Just the right stiffness between hard and too soft. You can really rest your feet on it in any way, and it is comfortable. This is good, because I don't just put my feet down and sit still at my desk! The cover also seems high quality, and has small grips (not noticeable to your feet) to prevent your feet from sliding. I highly recommend this cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly as photographed and described
customer_reviews.text: I added this to <Standing Desk Foot Stool | Adjustable Height Ergonomic Footrest Stool for Under Desk Support and for Stand up Desks (Black) by DeskRiser from Amazon> to add additional height. Both are 16" x 10". I played with the various heights and settled upon 11" (+ 6"). I can now elevate my feet and still use the dropped keyboard shelf. The soles of my feet are in full contact with the desk's "modesty plate" and my heels are on this cushion. The toes are about 1" below the underside of the desktop. It is great to be able to use my computer without the leg pain
customer_reviews.author: Ancient-Geek

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to take away the pain!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a recliner chair that has a very poofy seat cushion. It's so padded that my thighs were on an upward angle to where my knees hit the end of the cushion - the result being my legs were getting that "pins and needles" feeling - making using my brand new chair very uncomfortable. I figured if I could get my feet resting on something higher than the floor it would help. This cushion is exactly the right height and my legs are no longer uncomfortable! I use the curved side down so I have the flat part to rest my entire foot on. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: P. Koryn

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated foot swelling instantly
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best purchases. I was experiencing swelling on my left foot and toes. It was normal size in the morning but by noon the swelling intensified and bu evening I could barely walk. Since I started resting my feet on this product the swelling has subsided 95%. It is extremely comfortable for your legs and feet. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS FOOT REST.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I really like this footrest. It is firm and not squishy. I am 5'1" and I can't sit in an office chair that's high enough to write or type and still put my feet flat on the floor. I have one of these footrests on vinyl flooring; it will slide if I push it, but the textured "fabric" keeps it from sliding when I don't want it to. I bought a second one for my carpeted office. It works very well there, too. I take one of these to the living room if I'm sitting on the sofa or recliner - it's easy enough to carry. For me it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: WordTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Well...
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is much more sturdy than I thought it would be and not as comfortable as I had anticipated. Will try to work it in. If you are in the market for a solid feeling foot rest this one is perfect. It's well made and should be durable. Just wish it provided more of a softer feel that my feet could melt into.
customer_reviews.author: Alywily

customer_reviews.title: I like it when I am in my socks but find ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for work. I like it when I am in my socks but find it is too soft when I have my shoes on. I had to buy a harder plastic one to use that will really support my feet rather than something that feels good in socks. I still like it, it is just not something I can use all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Woopty doo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product, well made. I love the zippered cover so I can remove and wash as needed. I only wish it was a few inches taller. (I've actually turned this sideways and crossed my ankles over the short end). I used to prop my feet up on a plastic milk crate and that was the perfect height, but those don't last too long. The flip side for rocking my feet is pretty nice. I spend 8 hours at a desk with very little reason to get up and walk anywhere - so I needed this in my life.
customer_reviews.author: ldvega

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. My feet use to dangle from the chair and after sittin for long periods of time it was uncomfortable and painful. This product is wonderful. It's done wonders for my posture, comfort. I work from home so do not wear shoes while sitting at my desk. I tell all my friends about the difference it had made in my workdays. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: bezonline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. When I got it my coworkers looked at me a little sideways and asked what it was. I explained that being short, I have to raise my seat up high to type at the desk. This leaves me with my feet and legs dangling, which can cause a lot of pain. This gives me a nice spot to rest my feet at a comfortable angle that doesn’t put pressure on the back of my thighs or cause my legs to go to sleep. I love this. Tempted to get one for my desk at home.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudiaB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I work from home so I sit all the time. My feet sometimes swell or I just get uncomfortable sitting. This footrest has been so amazing. I sometimes use it flat and sometimes put it end to end to really elevate my leg. It is so easy to move around and use in many different positions. I also love that it not only has an outside washable cover but a secondary inside cover. This has really been great to have and has changed my comfort options.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Converted skeptic
customer_reviews.text: When this thing showed up, I was skeptical. But I was willing to give it a try because I was tired of hard plastic, metal, or wooden footstools. I work from home so I never wear shoes in my home office. This little contraption is amazing! It feels great as I sit at this desk working for hours. I thought it might be TOO squishy but it's actually perfect. And the little nubby things feel great on bare feet. So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Au

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: How have I never purchased one of these before?! It has completely changed my seated posture at work. My desk is too tall for my height (5'4"), and in order to type comfortably, I have to raise my chair so my feet barely graze the floor. It was cutting off the circulation in my legs and making them ache by the end of the day. This makes it much better, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brigante

customer_reviews.title: Life changing comfort and convenience
customer_reviews.text: My legs are short. I could either sit forward on our sofa to have my feet touch the floor, or I could sit all the way back and have my feet dangle. This cushion has made everything much more comfortable. I can sit all the way back on the sofa and rest my feet on this cushion without putting any strain on my joints. It is a fairly firm cushion which is good for making sure your feet and legs feel supported.
customer_reviews.author: Geminipen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for back/hip pain!
customer_reviews.text: My mother has severe spinal stenosis and she is just a little over 5' tall, so this is PERFECT for supporting her feet and putting her legs at a 45 degree angle to the floor, which makes her more comfortable by taking some pressure off her lower back when sitting. The cover is washable and it's easy to transport where ever she goes. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Feels So Good On My Feet and Ankles!
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a firm cushion for a footrest while sitting at a chair that you can use two ways -- either flat side down or curved side down. Both give a different experience to tired, sore feet. The curved side down allows me to rock the cushion thereby stretching my ankles and alleviating some tension in my feet/ankles. The gentle bumps on the cushion feel good on my feet. I haven't yet used it under my knees, so I cannot comment on that yet. I would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EvaluatorTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not as firm as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping it would be more firm but when I rest my feet on it, it just flattens like a pancake :/ Kind of an expensive pancake.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous footrest!
customer_reviews.text: At a staggering 4 feet 11 inches, my feet don't touch the ground when I'm poised in my office chair at work, so I went searching for a footrest not made of plastic to compensate for what I lack in height. This footrest is fabulous! Slightly cushy so my feet rest comfortably, but definitely sturdy enough give great support. Love being able to turn it over and rock my feet since I can never sit still anyway. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MissMarie

customer_reviews.title: Stays In Place & Its Silent
customer_reviews.text: This is my second under desk foot rest & I love it so much better than the first! I am short (5') and I have short legs. The height & width of this foot rest are perfect, its narrow enough that I can get it closer to my chair & high enough that my knees are actually bent while I'm sitting. I love the no-slip texture, it feels good on my skin and also keeps it in place. I also love that it can be used as a rocker or in fixed place. This is a happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette D Gavagan

customer_reviews.title: Bringing my back some relief.
customer_reviews.text: After trying a number of foot rests, this is by far the best I have used. Having the ability to flip it over, scoot it around and place your feet in so many different positions, it has lowered my back pain after extensive desk use. The desk at my office is far from ergonomically correct. This foot rest has brought the desk and seating a much more ergonomic position.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids to use at their desks and they are the perfect height. They're also easy for my kids to grab with their feet and reposition (because kids move around a lot). I thought they would show fuzz and dirt because they're black but they don't. I would recommend these foot rest cushions.
customer_reviews.author: cmr0996

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy! Limited life
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this foot rest would be too soft and 'cave in' too much. It's holding up just fine and it super comfy! It's easy to move from room to room, which is awesome! So far, so good! ****Today is 9/12/2019 and I've noticed a small hole in the fabric at the top of the foot rest. Granted it's been a little over a year, but I expected a little more life out of this product. I'm not terribly disappointed as it had held its shape and most of its firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Luv 'em, but. . . A little too narrow. Had to buy two.
customer_reviews.text: I use a pair of these all day, every day under my writing desk. I love the texture. They stay put without being hard to slide on the wood floor to adjust their position. (If they were a little heavier or a had a little more friction, I wouldn't have to put them back where I want them every morning after the Roomba has its way with them.) Although I've never thought of myself as a wide person, I had to buy a second one to avoid feeling like I had to constantly squeeze my thighs together to fit my feet onto on one.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Reed

customer_reviews.title: being 5'2" With this I can comfortably support not only my feet but knees and lower ...
customer_reviews.text: I have short legs, being 5'2" With this I can comfortably support not only my feet but knees and lower back (god I sound old :( But it definitely helps my knee pain and I love the texture (not too soft or firm). I also like the little silicone dots which prevents slipping of your feet while you have your feet at an angle. Definitely miss having it when I go studying in cafes or library since it would be too weird to carry it around. Overall, a happy camper with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dulguun

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a replacement because my dog peed on the original. I don’t know what happened but my foot rest from two years ago is far superior to what they sent me. The quality of these have dropped tremendously. They used to be 6 inches high now they’re only 4 and boy dose it make a difference. The foam material they use now is hard where as my old one was just the right amount of soft. I’m bummed out my old foot rest doesn’t exist anymore these cheap ones took over the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jermbear

customer_reviews.title: works great with recliner
customer_reviews.text: I bought a recliner that was really great for back support and otherwise fit, except that my feet didn't quite touch the floor and the ones where my feet did touch the floor just right weren't good for my back. For reasons unclear to me there weren't any recliners for my size (6 foot) and build that would do everything I wanted. Adding this foot rest cushion did the trick. My legs are well supported for sitting or rocking, while it also moves out of the way quite easily when reclining, all for a reasonable price making not only this purchase but my recliner purchase well worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: s.fang

customer_reviews.title: Recommended. Absolutely.
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need by letting me keep my feet flat at whatever angle I need. Sometimes I like to rest my ankles on the curved side. It's light enough that I can flip and turn it with just my feet, but the fabric makes it just grippy enough on the carpet that it doesn't slide out from under my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rottlover

customer_reviews.title: Good product, although large and somewhat high
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and grip, larger and higher than I expected. It might not fit too well under some computer desks owing to its height. But I use it for reading when I'm in my recliner, and it's more like a foot stool. If I were to purchase a foot rest for computer work I'd probably choose one that's lower, more inclined, and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Macburger52

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Foot Rest
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Elevates my feet while sitting at my desk.Helps to keep my ankles from swelling after sitting for long periods of time. I have used the Cushion without shoes and with shoes on. The cushion holds it's shape nicely with no issues. I am very glad I found this Cushion. I was going to purchase a foot stool, but this is better and more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to relieve discomfort and discourage myself from crossing my legs. Not working so great with the leg crossing, but overall I do like it. Bought a similar one for my office which hopefully I'll get to see someday.
customer_reviews.author: MET

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to help since I sit so much at work. It has definitely helped ease some of the pain in my knee. Definitely a great addition to all of the ergo stuff I have at work. Might as well be comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Bizzymammabee

customer_reviews.title: This works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This works better than I expected. I work at a desk from home all day and this is much better than the foot stool I was using. It is firm enough to support my feet yet much softer than a stool. I am short so it enables me to have support while keeping my chair height at the optimum level for work. I have even used it for head support on the floor for exercises. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C Graham

customer_reviews.title: great foot rest
customer_reviews.text: i got this rest since i work a desk job and needed something to make it more comfortable when i was sitting all day. this foot rest cushion is so comfortable and durable, it doesn't slip, and it really makes sitting at the desk a more bearable experience. i plan on getting another for when i work from home - would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Seamon

customer_reviews.title: A great ergonomic way to decrease pain while sitting!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for my chronic nerve low back, left leg and foot pain. I have severe fibromyalgia. Sitting has been a big problem. Reading the ad for how using this cushion will increase circulation and decrease my pain of back, leg,feet. This has proved to be true. I even use it outside when sitting on my patio. I can sit much longer without increased pain. I suggest making a cover that can be used inside and out. I would buy it! Let me know if you make one. I will buy this second cover to use outside! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Carla Fond du Lac, Wi.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this foot rest! My legs and back have never felt better. I would definitely recommend this product to others who sit and work 8 hrs a day at their desk. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: jsmiles33

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect....exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I use a standard 29" desk and rolling/swivel chair. With my chair in the correct position for my eyes and neck, it leaves my legs and hips in an uncomfortable way. This little cushion totally solved the problem! It also has these comfy little dots on it that feel nice on the feet. :) Perfect perfect perfect, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for my short legs under my desk. It's more comfortable without shoes or socks. It will not ever give much pain relief, because of how bad it is, but it does prevent current pain from becoming worse. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JodiE.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Sole!
customer_reviews.text: My husband spends long hours at his desk every day, and this foot rest has made him far more comfortable. I like the fact it has a removable, washable cover, and the size is perfect for under-the-desk use.
customer_reviews.author: Llamazon

customer_reviews.title: great for use in the office
customer_reviews.text: When you are stuck at a desk all day long this is a real blessing. takes a lot of pressure off your lower back. Got this in combination with the seat cushion and it has made a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Scooby1

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice foot rests
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my boyfriend and one for myself. These are very nice foot rests. They don't slide around and they are soft enough to be comfortable on bare feet yet firm enough to be supportive. I can even use them to prop up my feet/legs while in bed or laying on the couch. I've had it about a week, but I definitely think they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Hellkitten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for under the desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is the perfect size for me to put my feet on under my desk. I have a keyboard holder under my desk but my legs still fit. I am only 5'1" though so that may be why others have an issue with this being too high. I think it works perfectly and I am able to lift my chair without any issues of dangling feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The footrest does help my hips and feet, but ...
customer_reviews.text: The footrest does help my hips and feet, but not so much my knees. I'll give it a week to see if my knees improve. Well, it's been a couple weeks. I think what I really need is something that offers support under my knees as well. I do, however, alternate using / not using the footrest frequently throughout the day. Each change seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Taghi Zoghi

customer_reviews.title: Best footrest for any chair!
customer_reviews.text: I 've been looking for something like this for a long time! I have to have my feet at least 6" up from the floor under my desk to be comfortable. This is perfect. Soft for the back of the heel, high enough to relieve pressure from the edge of the chair on the back my of knees, great construction and great price! Buy one!
customer_reviews.author: LibraLuvsAqua

customer_reviews.title: Slides around, but works pretty well when I have to sit at the desk for a while
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my short legs if I'm going to be in front of the computer for a while. My only gripe is that it moves around too much. I put a rubber mat underneath it but it still does not "grip" and is constantly sliding away. I may get some caulk to put underneath to see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: MtnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Potential sensory issues
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2", and this is exactly the height I've been looking for in a footrest. The cover seems standard compared to other footrest cushions I've tried. My only problem with it is that I have sensory issues, and the amount of give in the cushion was viscerally uncomfortable. I (and I imagine anyone else with similar sensory issues) need a much firmer cushion. I don't feel like the level of firmness was described accurately enough on the page.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: It is very light and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a light, comfortable, well made, attractive footrest. I keep it in my office to make sure my back isn't strained when sitting for extended periods. For the money, it is a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Elizabeth Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement in leg pain
customer_reviews.text: I love that this can be both stationary or flipped over to allow for movement. I got it primarily to work as a foot rest in an area where an ottoman wouldn’t fit. And it has made such a difference. I didn’t realize how uncomfortable I was while sitting until this eased some of the positional strain for me. And it worked so well that I bought one as A gift for someone else a week later.
customer_reviews.author: Kul-Tiras

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new foot rest. It has helped with my posture and back pain. It will slip and slide if placed on a slick desk mat or hardwood floor but so far that hasn't been an issue for me. I work at home in bare feet a lot of the time and the knobby texture feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Dusguicheon

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far, good height and very comfortable. Helps with my leg swelling. Only complaint would be that it is a foam cushion and seems to already be less firm after only 2 weeks use
customer_reviews.author: christina w

customer_reviews.title: Excellent foot rest for our rocker/recliner when we don't want ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent foot rest for our rocker/recliner when we don't want to recline. The chairs are on the deep side so if you don't have very long legs you dangle your feet. This rest is the perfect height and very comfortable. Excellent purchase x2
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Judy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my short little legs
customer_reviews.text: I have these everywhere. Home, both offices... they last forever and provide great support for my short legs under the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Danika

customer_reviews.title: Well made, lightweight, removable cover.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to elevate one leg when I sit at my desk for long periods. This keeps ne from getting back pain. Great item, well made - I bought a second for another workstation I use...highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DWA

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This helps support my sore legs. Good product. I just have a difficult time keeping it away from my wife. Guess, I’ll have to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Gogolowski

customer_reviews.title: Best foot rest ever!
customer_reviews.text: I find that at my desk that my feet were dangling just a bit. This foot rest is exactly the right height for my feet. My legs and feet feel great tonight. I am so glad I bought this for work.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Rest Cushion that you can move your feet on without slide.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very happy with it. I work with the computer at about 8 to 9 hrs. a day, now I can move my feet on the rest cushion and it has a special cloth that it does not slide. So far so good. Saeed
customer_reviews.author: Saeed Taraji

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Too high for my long legs BUT was able to flip it over so the round side is down and now it sits more at an angle. It's cushie and has little grips so it doesn't slide over our carpet nor do my shoes slip off. Overall, it'll work.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrah

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing hip and leg pain from being at my desk too much. This foot rest pilloe is firm and non-slip on my vinyl plank flooring. It allows me to elevate my legs so that my legs are not dangling off the chair. Definitely works for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: MizPosey

customer_reviews.title: I like this but beware
customer_reviews.text: I like this but beware, the zipper gets caught on the rug easily and has caused damage. I ended up putting tape over the zipper to stop it from happening while still being able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I made the right decision choosing this foot rest cushion. It is everything I wanted and expected. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B

customer_reviews.title: High quality, a good choice
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this item. I use it at my desk every day at work with my shoes off. It has done a world of good for my comfort sitting at a desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: HerbSack

customer_reviews.title: Just what I didn't know I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use it under my desk at work. It's much more flexible than the flat footrests that I've had in the past. I can easily move it closer or farther away depending on my needs. I especially like turning it flat side up and rocking it. It's given me a lot more comfort and relief for my hip and knees than other solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: This cushion is perfect for helping me maintain proper posture at work
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is perfect for helping me maintain proper posture at work. I'm quite short, so getting the proper alignment with a desk that can't be adjusted is rather difficult. This cushion allows me to keep my chair elevated without leaving my feet dangling in midair. It's soft but firm, so it provides support without being harsh on the joints. The cover is durable and slip-resistant, so it's perfect for high heels.
customer_reviews.author: trumpelope

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to lift my feet and ankles when ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to lift my feet and ankles when I am working a my desk. It works to take the pressure off. I have overworked feet that will feel ache and feel restless. This cushions them and gives them support. The foot rest cushion is doing exactly what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Watts

customer_reviews.title: Such A Relief
customer_reviews.text: My Foot Rest Cushion has been and provided great relief considering I sit behind a desk for 10 hrs daily... I’m very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MsTeTe

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, well made and very, very comfortable. I especially love how I can use it upright/stationary, or turned over to rock my feet, and that the cover can be washed!
customer_reviews.author: laurav

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only 5' 3" tall, and this works great (with or without shoes) to keep my legs raised off the bottom of my office chair. Before, only my tip toes reached the ground and it put a lot of pressure on the bottoms of my upper legs sitting against the chair seat. Waaaay more comfortable now. It has a little bit of give, which is great, but it's still very firm. Also love that the cover comes off for easy washing.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent foot rest.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time, well packaged. It was exactly as described and I've been using it and very pleased with it. I am not only impressed with the product but also with the seller. They have reached out to me a few times to see how I like the product and if I have any complaints. They obviously care about the satisfaction of the consumer. So thank you.
customer_reviews.author: May Abboud

customer_reviews.title: Business Traveler MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I am a frequent business traveler and have a desk job that had wreaked havoc on my legs and circulation. I have had this cushion for 1 day and I can already feel and see the benefits. Plus the Adult ADHD side loves that you can flip it to rock.
customer_reviews.author: HereFisheeFishee

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solved!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cushion under my computer to rest my feet on. I have been having problems with my back lately and this cushion puts me in the right position to relieve that. I especially like turning it upside down for the rocking motion. It has really solved my problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: so I needed to get a higher chair to accommodate a better ergonomic posture
customer_reviews.text: I have a higher than normal desk at my job, so I needed to get a higher chair to accommodate a better ergonomic posture. As a result, my feet were too high off the ground. I got this because I needed a footrest to balance out the changes - I bought this one because it had a higher height than the rest and I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Bates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height for short people.  Super comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a foot rest cushion that was higher than 4" which is a standard height. I am short (5'3") and needed something with a few extra inches to give me the support I needed. I also didn't want something that was going to flatten the moment you put your feet on it. This is perfect. It's comfortable, easy to clean and the right height (6"). Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Anderson

customer_reviews.title: ... legs would crush this foot rest but I am happy to report that this foot rest supports my legs ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that my heavy legs would crush this foot rest but I am happy to report that this foot rest supports my legs pretty well! Feels great bare foot!
customer_reviews.author: T. FranciscoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exactly as described. Sad we can't get another one right now. Wonderful immediately out of box.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Thomas Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little boost to raise the legs and prevent DVTs. This fit the bill perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: CathyB

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This Foot Rest Cushion works very well. I use it with a recliner that is too big for me and this works well in supporting my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Useful everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is really good. It's not soft, it's useful everywhere. I always have back pain. So I ordered. I ordered two more. I will present my mom and sister.
customer_reviews.author: Maho

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect height for her and because it is padded
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foot rest for my 87 year old mother to help keep her feet elevated, thus reducing swelling in her feet. It is the perfect height for her and because it is padded, it is comfortable on her feet. She likes to use it up-side-down so she can rock her feet back and forth. It was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise H.

customer_reviews.title: Better than a step stool to rest your feet on.
customer_reviews.text: Unusual item. Easier on sore feet than a hard foot stool. You can put the curved side down, and exercise your feet by rocking it . It does move a little.
customer_reviews.author: SAV

customer_reviews.title: Footrest.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this his item to rest my feet on when doin long road trips to Alleviate the swelling. It also serves as a footstool, in the bed it can serve as a way to elevate your feet. I am satisfied, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s been great. I should have gotten this sooner
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s been great. I should have gotten this sooner. Really wanted to get one for my dad. It’s realy comfy and is at a comfortable stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Freya

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: It's a find product. A little softer than I'd like, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: MsFierce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work and love it. Don't know how I went so long without it.
customer_reviews.author: Asj

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little foot rest. I have a rocker/recliner and it great for when the chair is not in recline position and you can just rock or have your feet up a little. My cat loves it too. Thinks it's a great place to lay.😻
customer_reviews.author: summergirl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really work. I go to rest my feet on it and it just sinks
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie s

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for short people, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone who is short and struggles to get comfortable in most office chairs. This is a huge help to find a comfortable ergonomic position in the home office. Good quality product, I like the texture on the fabric and the shape of it.
customer_reviews.author: sventi

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size...
customer_reviews.text: Love this foot rest! I cannot speak to its durability, because it is new, but it looks like it will hold up. It fits perfectly under my occasional chair.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend, I might buy another one.
customer_reviews.text: perfect because my desk chair sits up and my legs dangle this helps me from cutting off my circulation in thighs as well as great for foot massage with the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: Great for your feet and knees!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft on your feet and knees yet supportive. I previously purchased a plastic foot rest which I used for several years and I liked the ability to change height on it which you can't do with this product HOWEVER it broke several times and when it was finally beyond use I purchased this one. I am enjoying it and the flexibility if offers for different uses. Plus I know it won't BREAK :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tara Jones

customer_reviews.title: Firm, yet super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second cushion. Now I have one at work and at home. I like this foot rest the best because it maintains its firmness, while feeling super comfortable for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" and this works great and is much more comfortable than having my legs dangling
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: covering is very forgiving and comfortable. I also use it in my office
customer_reviews.text: This foot rest is just what I needed for the car for long trips. I am around 5 ft tall and have had issues with my back on long trips for years due to my foot position on the floor in the car. With this foot rest, I had no issues on our last 1800+ mile trip. It is well made, covering is very forgiving and comfortable. I also use it in my office. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Murbix

customer_reviews.title: Feet approved
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Comfortable enough for a bed pillow but for the feet. Easily stores under desk or chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for keeping my feet elevated and busy while I study. The gripping dots go all the way around so it stays put whichever way I use it. Planning to take it to my 3 hour classes.
customer_reviews.author: rawchef

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this....my husband gave it to me for Christmas....great height...sturdy...doesn't move around....enough cushion so it gives a little without your feet sinking in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Smart n comfy foot rest exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The smart n comfy foot rest exceeded my expectations. It is extremely comfortable on my stocking feet and provides the support needed to relieve pressure on my lower back. Well made and quickly delivered, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Persephone

customer_reviews.title: but like that it's lightweight compared to the others
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit too high for my desk chair, but like that it's lightweight compared to the others!
customer_reviews.author: nachocorgidog

LIMITED UNITS AT THIS SPECIAL PRICE. GET YOURS NOW BEFORE IT IS TOO LATE.

LEG REST - Decrease Aching and Eliminate Strains Due To Long Periods of Sitting On Chair
DUAL FUNCTION - Turn The Foot Rest Upside Down To Achieve A Rocking Motion. Keep Your Legs and Feet Moving For Improved Concentration.
